segments.text: Can you pick up some things from the store for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , what do you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need a few things , I'll give you the list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there something else you need that you can think of ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Everything I need is on the list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want me to make any other stops while I'm out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Since you asked , would you pick up my medicine from the pharmacy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it ready to be picked up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . I'll do that for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really appreciate you doing this for me .
segments.speaker: S1
